name: Alchemical Waste
duration: Until the end of your next turn
desc:
You expel various waste products from alchemy in a 30 foot line. Creatures in the area of effect must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 2d8 acid damage. Expunging this waste decreases the cost of your next Transmutation spell before the end of your next turn by 1 AP.

~~Creatures without a soul are vulnerable to this spell's acid damage and take 3d8 acid damage instead.~~
empower: Creatures that fail the saving throw are also poisoned until the start of your next turn.
